name: Gunnerkrigg Court forum tweaks and theme mod 1.3.8
description: This compacts Proboards' styling on the Gunnerkrigg Court forums, which if you ask me is full of unnecessary padding and just bloat in general. Also adds some minor aesthetic changes, like alternating post colors and filled-background quotes. More screenshots, with descriptions, here. If you happen to have certain fonts from the webcomic installed (Ale and Wenches BB, Spirit Medium) the theme will use one of them for the banner text. Feel free to adapt for other forums.
additional_info:
1.0-1.2
 - Initial release
 - Tweaks and fixes

1.3
 - First put on userstyles.org
 - Optional dark theme

1.3.1
 - Fixed "edited by" margins
 - (Dark theme) Fixed post menus

1.3.2
 - Padding below post content reduced further
 - BBCode tab in posting page modified
 - (Dark theme) Black bar buttons slightly darker (Reply, New Thread, etc)
 - (Dark theme) Lighter background color for navigation breadcrumbs

1.3.3
 - Option to enable dark theme (instead of manually modifying)
 - (Dark theme) Option to have default-style banner

1.3.4
 - Prettied up text inputs

1.3.5
 - (Dark theme) Changed color of page/search bar

1.3.6
 - Certain links stay underlined while in focus
 - Expanded spoilers have same styling as quotes
 - Like buttons have same shadow outline as selected posts
 - Fixed thread index hover-related errors

1.3.7
 - Fixed gender icon causing post count to be off-center
 - Reduced spacing around attachments area
 - Option to hide default avatar

1.3.8
 - Fixed broken link to default avatar
 - Changed quote/spoiler styles to fit with site
